Name: Athena Pierce and Airship
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Head to the battlefield with Athena Pierce! She kindly helps you steer the ship. Press Ctrl to attack while riding this mount. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Head to the battlefield with Athena Pierce! Kind Athena Pierce helps you steer the ship. Press Ctrl to attack while riding this mount. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will fly automatically toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Head to the battlefield with Athena Pierce! She kindly helps you steer the ship. Press Ctrl to attack while riding this mount. This Mount skill allows you to travel very fast.

H.Old: ATT Damage 15%, DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120

h1.Old: ATT Damage 15%, DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
